WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I just downloaded the latest version 3.08 and noticed that the HCFA 1500 GIF file (HCFA1500_Red.gif) was still the old version (version 0938-0999 from 08/2005).  Does anybody know where I can get the latest one (0938-1197 from 02-2012) in GIF format.  The latest approved version has 12 lines vs. 4 lines for the Diagnoses (Line 21).

Thanks you in advance...

Steve


If you could, please help test branch:

[https://x12parser.svn.codeplex.com/svn/branches/837Typed/](https://x12parser.svn.codeplex.com/svn/branches/837Typed/)

Initial rendering of a 02/12 CMS-1500 was added.

Comments.Message:
Steve,

Did you ever get ahold of this document? I was wanting to add the generation for the 02-2012 version to the project with the added data to populate it.

Jeremy

Hi Jeremy,

I ended up creating one myself.  I attached the GIF file that I created.

Steve

Spasha,

Just wanted to update on this. I've abandoned the GIF form and went to a PDF form. Reson being that Fonet seems to be an abandoned format. Plus I think PDF give more flexibility as it can be rasterized to a TIFF using Ghostscript.

If you could, please help test branch:

[https://x12parser.svn.codeplex.com/svn/branches/837Typed/](https://x12parser.svn.codeplex.com/svn/branches/837Typed/)

Initial rendering of a 02/12 CMS-1500 was added.
